headline: Franklin's September AUM Rises on Market Gains Despite Outflows
summary: BEN's September AUM climbed to $1.66T, lifted by market gains even as long-term outflows continued.

headline: Franklin Resources Arm Acquires Apera, Expands Alternative Platform
summary: BEN arm's acquisition of Apera boosts its European private credit reach and lifts alternative assets to nearly $270 billion.

raw.headline: Franklin Resources Arm Acquires Apera, Expands Alternative Platform

headline: Q2 Earnings Roundup: Franklin Resources (NYSE:BEN) And The Rest Of The Custody Bank Segment
summary: Looking back on custody bank stocks’ Q2 earnings, we examine this quarter’s best and worst performers, including Franklin Resources (NYSE:BEN) and its peers.
